message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL

The paper discusses the use of plasticity in neural networks for lifelong learning, which falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE). The paper also discusses the use of gradient descent for optimization, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The experiments involve image reconstruction (cs.CV), meta-learning (cs.AI), and reinforcement learning (cs.CL), which are all subfields of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, the most likely categories are cs.NE and cs.LG, followed by cs.CV, cs.AI, and cs.CL.
